reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

title.narrative: Dimbalante Helping one another ? Promote education and healthy lifestyles through physical education

description.narrative: The project is a youth development initiative meant to reduce poverty and social exclusion in the Gambia through physical education. The main idea is to help youths complete their secondary education while promoting a healthy life style. Co-operation partn ers are The Sport Alliance of YMCAs in Finland (YMCA) The YMCAs in Gambia a National Youth NGO and Scholar Athletes for Change in Gambia (S.A.C) ? an official NGO in Gambia.This project is divided into three components namely (1) Afterschool programs (2) C amps (3) Health Fitness and Wellness. The whole project helps youth and their families by offering an opportunity for quality education equal rights to education physical education and improve their living conditions.In this project support will be provide d to underprivileged youths by giving them an opportunity to excel in education and /or physical education in a conducive and equal opportunity environment while promoting global thinking initiatives. This will help reduce the school dropout rate especiall y caused by the growing trend to become a professional athlete or emigrate to Europe by any means necessary. Partner organizations The Sport Alliance of YMCAs in Finland YMCAs of The Gambia and S.A.C are involved in community projects aimed at empowering y oung people vis a viz helping them develop proper nutritional habits encourage physical education and exercise and educate youth on sexually transmitted diseases such as HIV/AIDS and adolescent Reproductive Health alcohol and drugs abuse all of which contr ibute greatly to the very high mortality rate in Africa.
